name: Colorful Nightmare
description:
Use the number keys 1, 2 and 3 to change your umbrella color. Avoid making contact with different color raindrops or the level will be reset. Try to survive until the level time runs out and you advance to the next.

There's 3 levels at the moment with some plans on updates, just looking for some feedback at the moment. Such as how to improve the Gameplay. First ever published mini game on this site.

MUSIC BY: Zander Noriega

Zander Noriega - School of Quirks
